name: Murder Date
description:
It's time to fall in love with Jeff the Killer! You're a woman in college who has her education upended when a string of murders happens around campus. Try to solve the problem yourself, because you're better than everyone!

This debut game by MurmaiderII includes:                                                                                                 -An amount of words!

-Plenty of cringe!

-Original art and characters!

Play it and satisfy the cringey teen that secretly lives within.
